Posts.Content: I have not this exp, but have been fighting c.cancer and heart dis since 10/10.  I am 46 with n orpior health prob.  I think that the beat thing to do is stay on the docs, even if that means going elsewhere.  One time b/f going to CTCA(cancer tmt ctrs of am)., I told my DH that I was worried about hrting my local docs feelings, he aaid even if it means your life.................I look at things diff now, I will pray for you during your surgery:)  I have dense breasts and also worry about breat cancer.............I will be thinking of u on friday...........
Posts.Title: worried and scared
